testcase.classname: Feature to test product stock in Amazon
testcase.name: Verify stock in Amazon for - PlayStation 4
testcase.system-out: Given Browser is open - Amazon..............................................passed And User enters Amazon homepage.............................................passed When User inputs a PlayStation 4 in Amazon search box.......................passed And User clicks Amazon search button........................................passed And User is on Amazon PlayStation 4 results page............................passed And User clicks Amazon PlayStation 4 link...................................passed Then User verifies PlayStation 4 stock in Amazon............................passed
